rows.label: qst200516_msg026
rows.name: I have retrieved all the paintings.

rows.label: qst200516_msg027
rows.name:
Oh, really!? That's a
great help, thank you!

rows.label: qst200516_msg001
rows.name:
Yes, yes. I'm so glad
the paintings are safe!

rows.label: qst200516_msg002
rows.name:
...But looking at them
again, they're terrible.
It's kind of embarrassing.

rows.label: qst200516_msg003
rows.name: No, there is nothing to be ashamed of.

rows.label: qst200516_msg004
rows.name:
There is a saying, "Passion
is the road to betterment."

rows.label: qst200516_msg005
rows.name:
If you maintain your passion and
continue to paint, you should be
able to create wonderful art.

rows.label: qst200516_msg006
rows.name: I see... That's right.

rows.label: qst200516_msg007
rows.name:
Having someone like you to cheer me
on makes me want to try harder.

rows.label: qst200516_msg008
rows.name:
Managing several restaurants
is busy, but maybe I'll find
the time to continue.

rows.label: qst200516_msg009
rows.name: Hm? ...Restaurants?

rows.label: qst200516_msg010
rows.name: Is something wrong?

rows.label: qst200516_msg011
rows.name:
...Could it be that you're
interested in cooking?

rows.label: qst200516_msg028
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst200516_msg012
rows.name:
Actually, I enjoy making sweets
and I'm also interested in the
profession of a p√¢tissier...

rows.label: qst200516_msg013
rows.name:
However, being a Blade, I tried
not to think about it too much.

rows.label: qst200516_msg014
rows.name:
What are you saying? There's
no need to hide it.

rows.label: qst200516_msg015
rows.name:
"Passion is the road to
betterment," right?

rows.label: qst200516_msg016
rows.name:
If you maintain your passion,
nothing should be impossible.

rows.label: qst200516_msg017
rows.name:
Hehe... That's certainly
true. You've got me there.

rows.label: qst200516_msg018
rows.name:
Alright, as a reward for this job,
I'll lend you one of my shops!

rows.label: qst200516_msg029
rows.name:
There happens to be
one vacant right now.

rows.label: qst200516_msg030
rows.name:
You'll be the manager, I'll be
the owner, so I'll have to take
a part of the profit, but...

rows.label: qst200516_msg031
rows.name: What do you say? Want to give it a try?

rows.label: qst200516_msg019
rows.name:
No, I appreciate the thought,
but that's a bit much...

rows.label: qst200516_msg020
rows.name:
It's fine, it's fine. First,
just go and have a look.

rows.label: qst200516_msg021
rows.name:
If you like it, you can
use it as you please.

rows.label: qst200516_msg022
rows.name: However...

rows.label: qst200516_msg023
rows.name:
Come on, Yuou, since we have the
chance, let's go have a look.

rows.label: qst200516_msg024
rows.name:
You can always refuse
after that, can't you?

rows.label: qst200516_msg025
rows.name: I see... Then, shall we go?

rows.label: qst200516_msg032
rows.name:
The shop is in the plaza near
the Fons Maim main gate. Take
your time looking around.
